PHRASE.LANG: A grand bed chamber for royalty. No Keep is complete without the King's Chambers.\n This update comes with more additions to the Crystal Hunter mini-game for owners and guests.[#Legal]

Une grande chambre à coucher de la royauté. Aucune Gardez terminée sans Chambers du roi. Cette mise à jour est livré avec plus des ajouts à la Hunter Crystal mini-jeu pour les propriétaires et les invités.\n\n A grand bed chamber for royalty. No Keep is complete without the King's Chambers. This update comes with more additions to the Crystal Hunter mini-game for owners and guests.[#Legal]

Ein großes Bett Kammer für Lizenzgebühren. Kein Halten ist komplett ohne des Königs Chambers. Dieses Update kommt mit mehr Ergänzungen der Crystal Hunter-Minispiel für Besitzer und Gäste.\n\n A grand bed chamber for royalty. No Keep is complete without the King's Chambers. This update comes with more additions to the Crystal Hunter mini-game for owners and guests.[#Legal]

Una camera da letto grande per royalty. Nessun Tenere è completa senza Chambers del re. Questo aggiornamento viene fornito con più aggiunte al Crystal Hunter mini-gioco per i proprietari e gli ospiti.\n\n A grand bed chamber for royalty. No Keep is complete without the King's Chambers. This update comes with more additions to the Crystal Hunter mini-game for owners and guests.[#Legal]

Una cámara de gran cama de la realeza. No Manténgase está completo sin los aposentos del rey. Esta actualización viene con más adiciones al Crystal Hunter mini-juego para los propietarios e invitados.\n\n A grand bed chamber for royalty. No Keep is complete without the King's Chambers. This update comes with more additions to the Crystal Hunter mini-game for owners and guests.[#Legal]
